author: cmadrid1
body:
This PR adds new parameters for the HBHE time slew delay function used for M2 and simulation. It also makes time slew an event producer. 

Validation:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/649519/contributions/2641903/attachments/1495366/2326436/TimeSlewCorrections.pdf

Minor improvements for HPD simulation and data digi comparison as well as lower chi2 for simulation reco. 

@hatakeyamak @kpedro88 @mariadalfonso
title: HBHE: New time slew parameters and upgrade of time slew class
